entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Light snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
